genresAdvancedInfo.name: early avant garde
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This genre emerged in the early 20th century and was characterized by its experimental and unconventional approach to music. It was often associated with the Dada and Surrealist art movements and sought to challenge traditional musical structures and techniques. Early avant-garde music was heavily influenced by the use of electronic instruments and the incorporation of non-musical sounds.
